name: Eterna Hybrid Exchange
description: Eterna Hybrid Exchange (EHX) combines the best features of centralized (CEX) and decentralized (DEX) exchanges. Eterna combines Order Book trading with Binance Cloud-enabled liquidity. In Version 2, we will deploy our proprietary AMM-aggregator, that allows investors to execute their trades on PCS and Uniswap, as well as AVAX, MATIC, and ADA. Eterna is the first exchange to share 50% of its net income with EHX token stakers, creating an underlying value proposition that is unmatched in the crypto space.
